meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Pawson Brad Rutter Mark Lowenthal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6833.

div.div: Battle of the Decades quarterfinal game 3.

td.p: Dan Pawson, a global health consultant from Brooklyn, New York
Brad Rutter, an actor and producer from Hollywood, California
Mark Lowenthal, an intelligence educator from Reston, Virginia

tr.td: VERBS WITH OTHER MEANINGS
FARMING
FROM "D" TO DINING "D"
(Alex: Each correct response beginning and ending with that letter.)
FOLKLORE
THE SOUTH
THEY LEFT US IN THE LAST YEAR
